body_html: @fmassa Another application might be (not sure), for example if you have a tensor of shape (128, 512, 512) storing 128 images each of size 512*512 in gray scale. Then doing a combinations_with_replacement would get a tensor of shape (8256, 512, 512, 2) of 8256 possible pairs of images. The resulting tensor might be useful for batch processing for models that takes pairs of images as input. These are not my area of study, so I don't know if the example above is good or not.

body: @fmassa Another application might be (not sure), for example if you have a tensor of shape (128, 512, 512) storing 128 images each of size 512*512 in gray scale. Then doing a `combinations_with_replacement` would get a tensor of shape (8256, 512, 512, 2) of 8256 possible pairs of images. The resulting tensor might be useful for batch processing for models that takes pairs of images as input. These are not my area of study, so I don't know if the example above is good or not.
